name: status.toml
rawContent:
# Project Status
# ================================================
# ElderCare - Elderly Care Services Platform
# Three mobile apps: Client, Specialist, Admin
# ================================================

[status]
id = "eldercare"
name = "ElderCare Services Platform"
profile = "medium"  # medium - multi-role, relational data, 3 apps
currentPhase = "done"
multiPlatform = true  # 3 separate mobile apps
lastUpdated = "2025-01-14"

# Phase 0: Assessment - COMPLETED
[phases.assessment]
status = "completed"
description = "Determine project scope and profile"

[phases.assessment.checklist]
typeIdentified = true      # mobile apps
rolesCount = true          # 3 roles: client, specialist, admin
dataComplexity = true      # relational - orders, specialists, services
platformsIdentified = true # 3 platforms: client-app, specialist-app, admin-app
profileSelected = true     # medium

# Phase 1: Discovery - COMPLETED
[phases.discovery]
status = "completed"
description = "Understanding the project"

[phases.discovery.checklist]
projectDefined = true
targetAudience = true
coreValue = true
keyFeatures = true
scopeDefined = true

# Phase 2: Design - COMPLETED
[phases.design]
status = "completed"
skip = false
description = "Visual and UX requirements"

[phases.design.checklist]
designApproach = true
colorScheme = true
responsiveStrategy = true
localization = true

# Phase 3: Access Control - COMPLETED
[phases.access]
status = "completed"
skip = false
description = "User roles and permissions"

[phases.access.checklist]
authModelDefined = true
rolesIdentified = true
permissionsDefined = true
guardsCreated = true

# Phase 4: Data Model - COMPLETED
[phases.data]
status = "completed"
description = "Entities and relationships"

[phases.data.checklist]
entitiesListed = true
fieldsDefined = true
relationsMapped = true

# Phase 5: Features & Screens - COMPLETED
[phases.features]
status = "completed"
description = "Use cases, routes, components"

[phases.features.checklist]
useCasesDefined = true
routesCreated = true
pageComponents = true
compositions = true
platformsDefined = true

# Phase 6: Modules (complex only) - SKIPPED
[phases.modules]
status = "pending"
skip = true
description = "Domain decomposition"

[phases.modules.checklist]
domainsIdentified = false
modulesDefined = false
interfacesSet = false

# Phase 7: Prototype - COMPLETED
[phases.prototype]
status = "completed"
description = "Working React screens"

[phases.prototype.checklist]
demoCleanedUp = true
mocksGenerated = true
pagesCreated = true
navigationWorks = true
formsWired = true

# Phase 8: Schema - COMPLETED
[phases.schema]
status = "completed"
skip = false
description = "Database schema"

[phases.schema.checklist]
prismaGenerated = true
relationsValid = true
indexesAdded = true
